text: Di Meuse jinoe ureueng bloe bagah Ubak peureumoh geukheun lheuh geubloe Beu got tasiboe aneuk meutuah Aneuk agamnyoe tahiroe beu got p Tatueng munaphaʻat raya phaedah i Tatueng jih keu aneuk le gatanyoe Sinan keuh jinoe Yusuf meukeubah Kamoe bri teumpat Yusuf di bumoe Keumeung peureunoe ‘eleumee Allah Mangat jiteupue dum ta‘bi leumpoe Kamoe peureunoe sinan meupeugah Tuhan kuasa peue nyang Neupeugot Insan dum meuhat nyang le that ulah Le manusia hana jiteupue
